title: DISABLE_RAW_KEY_THIS_FRAME
content:
0x8BCF0014// DisableRawKeyThisFrame
BOOL DISABLE_RAW_KEY_THIS_FRAME(int rawKeyIndex);Parameters:rawKeyIndex: Index of raw key from keyboard.Returns: Returns bool value of down state.Disables the specified rawKeyIndex, making it not trigger the regular IS_RAW_KEY_* natives.Virtual key codes can be found hereExamples:Lualocal KEY_SPACE = 32
DisableRawKeyThisFrame(KEY_SPACE)
-- This will not get triggered this frame
if IsRawKeyDown(KEY_SPACE) then
	print("unreachable :(")
end
-- this will get triggered
if IsDisabledRawKeyDown(KEY_SPACE) then
    print("Spacebar is down")
end
codeBlocks:
local KEY_SPACE = 32
DisableRawKeyThisFrame(KEY_SPACE)
-- This will not get triggered this frame
if IsRawKeyDown(KEY_SPACE) then
end
-- this will get triggered
if IsDisabledRawKeyDown(KEY_SPACE) then
end
